desc: Blu Wave SUP is Canada's leading designer and manufacturer of Stand-up Paddleboards. Blu Wave, based in Collingwood, ON.

layout.text: FIND YOUR ADVENTURE....THE POSSIBILITIES ARE ENDLESS
